localTransport.details: Arrange for a pre-booked taxi from the airport to your accommodation and for intercity travel. Use autorickshaws for short distances within the cities.

accommodation.name: The Hosteller Kochi
accommodation.address: 1/401, Calvathy Road, Fort Kochi, Kochi, Kerala 682001, India

activities.title: Arrival in Kochi & Transfer to Fort Kochi
activities.description: Arrive at Cochin International Airport (COK). Transfer to your accommodation in Fort Kochi. Check in and freshen up.
activities.location: Cochin International Airport (COK) to Fort Kochi

activities.title: Explore Fort Kochi
activities.description: Visit the Chinese Fishing Nets, St. Francis Church, and the Dutch Cemetery. Wander through the historic streets and admire the colonial architecture.

sustainableAlternative.title: Walking Tour of Fort Kochi
sustainableAlternative.description: Opt for a guided walking tour to learn about the history and culture of Fort Kochi from a local perspective.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local guides and reduces reliance on vehicles.

activities.title: Kathakali Performance
activities.description: Experience a traditional Kathakali dance performance, a classical Indian dance form from Kerala.

activities.title: Dinner at a Local Restaurant
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious Keralan dinner at a local restaurant in Fort Kochi. Try the fresh seafood and local curries.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Backwater Cruise in Alleppey
activities.description: Take a scenic backwater cruise on a traditional houseboat in Alleppey (Alappuzha). Enjoy the serene views of the Kerala backwaters, villages, and coconut groves.

sustainableAlternative.title: Canoe Ride in Alleppey
sustainableAlternative.description: Take a smaller, non-motorized canoe instead of a houseboat. This offers a quieter and more eco-friendly way to experience the backwaters.

activities.title: Lunch on the Houseboat
activities.description: Enjoy a traditional Keralan lunch prepared on the houseboat, featuring fresh seafood and local delicacies.

activities.title: Village Visit
activities.description: Visit a local village along the backwaters and interact with the residents. Learn about their traditional way of life and culture.

activities.title: Return to Kochi
activities.description: Return to Kochi in the evening and have dinner at a restaurant of your choice.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Travel to Munnar
activities.description: Travel from Kochi to Munnar, a scenic hill station known for its tea plantations. Enjoy the picturesque views along the way.

activities.title: Tea Plantation Visit
activities.description: Visit a tea plantation and learn about the process of tea cultivation and production. Enjoy a tea tasting session.

sustainableAlternative.title: Organic Tea Garden Visit
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit a smaller, organic tea garden that uses sustainable farming practices. Learn about their eco-friendly methods.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Promotes sustainable agriculture and protects biodiversity.

activities.title: Mattupetty Dam
activities.description: Visit Mattupetty Dam and enjoy boating on the lake. Admire the scenic views of the surrounding hills and forests.

activities.title: Dinner in Munnar
activities.description: Enjoy a dinner at one of the restaurants in Munnar. Sample the local cuisine of the region.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Eravikulam National Park
activities.description: Visit Eravikulam National Park, home to the endangered Nilgiri Tahr. Enjoy a trek through the park and admire the scenic views of the surrounding hills.

activities.title: Lunch in Munnar
activities.description: Have lunch at a restaurant in Munnar before continuing your exploration of the region.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Anamudi Peak (View Point)
activities.description: Visit Anamudi Peak, the highest peak in South India. While access to the peak itself might be restricted, enjoy the views from the viewpoint.

sustainableAlternative.title: Guided Nature Walk
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of a standard visit, take a guided nature walk in the surrounding hills to learn about the local flora and fauna.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local guides and promotes environmental awareness.

activities.title: Spice Garden Visit
activities.description: Visit a local spice garden to learn about various spices grown in the region, such as cardamom, pepper, and cinnamon.

activities.title: Dinner in Munnar
activities.description: Enjoy a farewell dinner in Munnar, savoring the flavors of Kerala.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Travel to Kochi
activities.description: Travel back to Kochi from Munnar.

activities.title: Shopping in Kochi
activities.description: Explore the local markets and shops in Kochi for souvenirs, spices, and handicrafts. Visit Jew Town for antique shops and spice markets.

sustainableAlternative.title: Fair Trade Shopping
sustainableAlternative.description: Focus on purchasing items from fair-trade shops that support local artisans and ensure ethical production.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports sustainable livelihoods and promotes responsible consumption.

activities.title: Sunset Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing sunset cruise on the Kochi harbor. Watch the sun set over the Arabian Sea.

sustainableAlternative.title: Harbour Walk
sustainableAlternative.description: Walk along the waterfront, taking in the harbour views and local sights, instead of a boat trip.

activities.title: Farewell Dinner
activities.description: Enjoy a farewell dinner in Kochi, reminiscing about your trip to Kerala.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Explore More of Kochi (Optional)
activities.description: If you have some free time before your flight, revisit your favorite spots in Kochi or explore new areas.

activities.title: Transfer to Cochin International Airport
activities.description: Transfer to Cochin International Airport (COK) for your flight back to Mumbai.

activities.title: Departure from Kochi
activities.description: Depart from Cochin International Airport (COK).
